mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM( SELECT s.show_num num, s.show_name title, t.schedule_date showDate, t.cntDate cntDate, s.show_check status FROM show s RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT show_num, schedule_date, nvl(count(*),0)cntDate FROM schedule GROUP BY schedule_date, show_num)t ON s.show_num = t.show_num order by schedule_date desc ) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 5
